name: 华夏五千年
description:
This is a buyout system of the game, after the purchase will directly get all the content of the game.

Including subsequent updates, as well as all of the current story and gameplay.

The game has a powerful equipment system, as well as a strategic turn-based combat system.

The game has a completely free career transfer system. This means that you will have your own unique class combo team in the game.
